ar: وَنُنَزِّلُ مِنَ ٱلْقُرْءَانِ مَا هُوَ شِفَآءٌ
en: And We send down of the Qur’an that which is healing
but it does not increase the wrongdoers except in loss.
And when We bestow favor upon man [i.e., the disbeliever],
he turns away and distances himself;
and when evil touches him, he is ever despairing.
Say, "Each works according to his manner,

ar: فَرَبُّكُمْ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنْ هُوَ أَهْدَىٰ سَبِيلًا
en: but your Lord is most knowing of who is best guided in way."
And they ask you, [O Muhammad], about the soul.
Say, "The soul is of the affair [i.e., concern] of my Lord.

ar: وَمَآ أُوتِيتُم مِّنَ ٱلْعِلْمِ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
en: And you [i.e., mankind] have not been given of knowledge except a little."
